thread.title: Randy Fenoli from “Say Yes to the Dress” is designing wedding gowns, FINALLY
thread.title_full: Randy Fenoli from “Say Yes to the Dress” is designing wedding gowns, FINALLY

author: Gabriela Herstik
title: Randy Fenoli from “Say Yes to the Dress” is designing wedding gowns, FINALLY
text:
Randy Fenoli from “Say Yes to the Dress” is designing wedding gowns, FINALLY The cat’s out of the bag! Our favorite bridal gown maven, Randy Fenoli is debuting his new bridal collection at Bridal Fashion Week in April. The S ay Yes to The Dress star and author is now adding designer to his impressive list of pursuits and we are so excited. The former fashion director at New York’s Kleinfeld Bridal will be introducing 25 dresses with his line, Randy Fenoli Bridal, which will be available at Kleinfeld Bridal in Manhattan after the runway show at Bridal Fashion Week. The gowns will feature luxe embellishments like tonal beading and soft, flowing layers, according to an exclusive interview with The Knot. 
CAT'S OUT OF THE BAG! I'm launching my New Bridal Collection, Randy Fenoli Bridal, this April at Bridal Fashion Week! More info to follow. ❤ 
A post shared by Randy Fenoli (@randyfenoli) on Feb 21, 2017 at 1:40pm PST 
The line will feature Randy’s eye for proportion and glamour and will range in price from $1,500 to $3,000. Randy told The Knot:
“A wedding gown is the most important piece of clothing a woman will ever wear, so to be able to create something she loves is the most rewarding feeling for me. My deep connection to brides inspired each piece in my premiere collection, and I am truly honored to be a part of making a woman feel her most beautiful.” BIG news! @RandyFenoli is designing 25 wedding dresses and he's debuting the collection on April 20th at #Kleinfeld ✨The #RandyFenoli Bridal collection will retail between $1,500 - $3,000 ❤ Make an appointment after April 20th to try-on & see his new #weddingdress(es)! ✨#WeddingWednesday 
A post shared by Kleinfeld Bridal (@kleinfeldbridal) on Feb 22, 2017 at 6:09am PST 
Randy has also teased the line with a sketch of one of his gowns. A decadent floral concoction with the illusion of a full skirt with a mermaid silhouette.
Say Yes to the Dress's Randy Fenoli Is Designing His Own Wedding Dresses Now https://t.co/mMajDCHmQN pic.twitter.com/DCwFIuua0S 
— Cosmopolitan (@Cosmopolitan) February 21, 2017 Randy’s daring eye is sure to be the ultimate key to helping more and more brides feeling like a million bucks.
#TBT bridal gown from Randy Fenoli for the Diamond Collection! #SYTTD #sayyestothedress #weddingdress #randyfenoli 
A post shared by Randy Fenoli (@randyfenoli) on Feb 16, 2017 at 9:15am PST 
And now with his own line, how are we expected to not say yes to the dress?
